datalist.name: None
datalist.message: Invalid Dialog

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_01
datalist.message:
Chronos, an enemy has appeared!
Let me show you how to battle!

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_02
datalist.message:
First, I'll explain
the game rules.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_03
datalist.message: This is the timer.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_04
datalist.message:
The player with the most HP
remaining within this time wins.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_05
datalist.message:
The game will end immediately
if either party's HP reaches 0.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_01
datalist.message:
To deal damage,
you need to send out
a unit.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_02
datalist.message:
The unit will attack when it reaches the enemy
Try deploying!

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_03
datalist.message:
Deployed!
The character has
several parameters.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_04
datalist.message:
This is the character's HP.
When it reaches 0,
they'll retreat.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_05
datalist.message:
This is Attack Power.
The higher the number, the
more damage you deal.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_06
datalist.message:
This is your level.
This can be raised with XP.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_07
datalist.message:
This is the battle counter.
You'll act when the memory runs out.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_01
datalist.message:
The enemy has deployed!
Intercept with a weapon card!

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_02
datalist.message:
the player's MP
is required for the card.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_03
datalist.message:
You're running out of MP……
MP will increase over time.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_04
datalist.message:
You can also convert cards
into more MP.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_05
datalist.message:
This time, wait for
your MP to increase.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_06
datalist.message:
MP increased!
Deploy a unit in the same lane
as the enemy!

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_07
datalist.message:
If the unit wins, it'll
recieve a BREAK and advance 1 tile.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_08
datalist.message: If you lose, you'll retreat.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_09
datalist.message:
When attacking Chronos
the weapon card is destroyed by the counterattack.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_10
datalist.message:
Also, when a unit is not
deployed, its HP
gradually recovers.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_01
datalist.message: Next, we'll talk about reviving.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_02
datalist.message:
If your character is retreated,
it can't return until the counter elapses.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_03
datalist.message:
However, by touching the revive icon,
you can pay a life to
revive a character.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_04
datalist.message:
Good job on reviving.
If you really need to revive a character,
that's one way to do it.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_01
datalist.message: Now I'll explain cards.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_02
datalist.message:
You can draw as many cards
as the stock allows.
Card stock increase over time.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_03
datalist.message:
You can draw cards using the Pull button
on each character.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_04
datalist.message: Let's pull a card.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_05
datalist.message:
Watch the battle and decide which
character's card to draw!

datalist.name: Tutorial_05_01
datalist.message: Let's use a tool card.

datalist.name: Tutorial_05_02
datalist.message:
When a tool card is used,
it appears on the
deployed character.

datalist.name: Tutorial_05_03
datalist.message:
Let's strengthen a
deployed unit.

datalist.name: Tutorial_05_04
datalist.message:
Your unit is stronger!
Change the outcome of the battle
using tool cards!

datalist.name: Tutorial_06_01
datalist.message:
Unlike tool cards, Magic cards
require a chanting time before activating.

datalist.name: Tutorial_06_02
datalist.message:
It also can't be used if
chanting fails.

datalist.name: Tutorial_06_03
datalist.message:
A successful chant can be
very powerful!

datalist.name: Tutorial_07_01
datalist.message:
Lacking MP
for this card……

datalist.name: Tutorial_07_02
datalist.message:
If that's the case,
you can convert cards to MP.
Let's try it!

datalist.name: Tutorial_07_03
datalist.message:
If you're in a pinch for MP
convert unneeded cards!

datalist.name: Tutorial_08_01
datalist.message:
Regalia is a special power
that can only be used once in battle.

datalist.name: Tutorial_08_02
datalist.message:
Activate Regalia when
the gauge is full.
Be careful when you use it!

datalist.name: Tutorial_08_03
datalist.message:
That's all for the basics.
Finally, let's fight
in a 1v1 battle!

datalist.name: Home_CPU3vs3_Start
datalist.message:
チュートリアル終了です。
次は3対3バトルの
COM戦に挑戦してみましょう！

datalist.name: Home_CPU3vs3_End
datalist.message:
おめでとうございます！
新たな機能が開放されました！

datalist.name: Home_CardGeneration_01
datalist.message:
さきほど手に入れた素材で
カードを生成することができます。

datalist.name: Home_CardGeneration_02
datalist.message:
『カード生成』はショップの中に
あります。

datalist.name: Home_CardGeneration_03
datalist.message:
素材が足りない時は、
対戦で素材を集めましょう！

datalist.name: Home_PartyEdit_01
datalist.message:
編集からパーティ編成へ。
キャラクターを選んで
『カードセット』を
タッチしてみましょう！

datalist.name: Home_PartyEdit_02
datalist.message:
カードセットを編集したときは
忘れずに『保存』ボタンを
押しましょう！

datalist.name: Home_PartyEdit_03
datalist.message:
私からの説明は以上ですが、
プレイの流れを見てみましょう！

datalist.name: Home_Present
datalist.message:
最後に、最高レア『絶対神ゼウス』を
プレゼントしました！
編成からカードセットに組み込もう！

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_01
datalist.message:
Dear Chronos, we are in trouble!
An enemy has appeared!

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_02
datalist.message: Let me explain to you how to win the battle.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_03
datalist.message:
This is <#ff0046>Chronos' HP</color>.
The HP bar and numbers confirm this.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_04
datalist.message:
This is the <#ff0046>enemy's HP</color>.
By <#ff0046>reducing it to 0</color>,
Chronos<#ff0046> will win</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_05
datalist.message:
This is the <#ff0046>remaining Count</color>.
When it reaches 0, the <#ff0046>winner</color> is whoever has <#ff0046>more HP remaining</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_06
datalist.message:
To reduce the enemy's HP,
Chronos needs to <#ff0046>give instructions</color> to <#ff0046>their allies</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_00_07
datalist.message:
Give instructions to allied units
and aim for victory!

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_01
datalist.message: Cards are used to give instructions to units.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_02
datalist.message: First, <#ff0046>touch</color> the <#ff0046>weapon card</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_03
datalist.message: Weapon card information will be shown.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_04
datalist.message: This number is the <#ff0046>MP required</color> to use the card.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_05
datalist.message: This is the <#ff0046>attack power</color> of the card. It shows how much damage can be dealt.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_06
datalist.message: <#ff0046>This icon represents the required count for movement</color>. I'll explain this later.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_07
datalist.message: You touch a card that way to view it's information.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_08
datalist.message: Find out how many MP are required to use the card.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_09
datalist.message: This is the <#ff0046>MP of Lord Chronos</color>. It will increase over time.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_10
datalist.message: Looks like you don't have MP... <#ff0046>Let's wait a moment</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_11
datalist.message: MP have increased! You can now use your card!

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_12
datalist.message: When weapon cards are used, the unit will deploy.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_13
datalist.message: Touch <#ff0046>"Deploy"</color> to <#ff0046>send them out</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_14
datalist.message: It worked!

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_15
datalist.message: The unit has several parameters.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_16
datalist.message: <#ff0046>The unit's HP</color>. When it reaches 0 the unit will retreat for a certain time.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_17
datalist.message: <#ff0046>The unit's attack power</color>. The higher the number, the more damage you'll inflict.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_18
datalist.message: <#ff0046>The unit's level</color>. Actions will increase your level.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_19
datalist.message: Deployed units will move forward by themselves.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_20
datalist.message: Have a look at <#ff0046>the cards in your hand</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_21
datalist.message: You have pulled another card.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_22
datalist.message: Cards are automatically replenished over time.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_23
datalist.message: Each unit can have up to 3 cards in hand.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_24
datalist.message: If the hand is full, the <#ff0046>card stock</color> will increase.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_25
datalist.message: If there is a free slot in your hand, the <#ff0046>card stock</color> will be used.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_26
datalist.message: An enemy has appeared! Let's not be hasty now and <#ff0046>see what happens</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_27
datalist.message: The speed at which a unit moves depends on the weapon. <#ff0046>Touch</color> the unit!

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_28
datalist.message: For this weapon card, every <#ff0046>3 counts</color>, the unit will move.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_29
datalist.message: This is the remaining count to move. When all lights go off, you will move.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_30
datalist.message: When you run into an enemy, combat will begin.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_31
datalist.message: This is the <#ff0046>count until combat</color>. Combat will occur when 3 counts have elapsed.

datalist.name: Tutorial_01_32
datalist.message: Combat continues until either side's HP is dropped to 0.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_01
datalist.message: Their HP is <#ff0046>flashing red</color>! If you do not intervene, they will be defeated in the next battle!

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_02
datalist.message: To help your allies, <#ff0046>touch</color> the <#ff0046>tool card</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_03
datalist.message: This tool card can restore the HP of an ally.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_04
datalist.message: This number is the <#ff0046>amount that will be recovered</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_05
datalist.message: Like a weapon card, it consumes MP. Touch <#ff0046>"Use"</color> to <#ff0046>use it</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_06
datalist.message: You have successfully recovered! <#ff0046>Let's see how the battle continues</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_07
datalist.message: You have done it! If you win a battle, you will <#ff0046>BREAK</color> and move <#ff0046>one square forward</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_08
datalist.message: If you lose the battle, you will <#ff0046>retreat</color> until the count reaches 0.

datalist.name: Tutorial_02_09
datalist.message: It's tough!　A new enemy!

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_01
datalist.message: If this continues, our allies will be in danger! <#ff0046>Touch</color> the <#ff0046>magic card</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_02
datalist.message: This magic card can restore an ally's HP.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_03
datalist.message: This number is the <#ff0046>count until activation</color>. Unlike tool cards, magic cards require <#ff0046>casting</color> before they can be activated!

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_04
datalist.message: <#ff0046>Touch</color> on <#ff0046>"Cast"</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_05
datalist.message: This number is the casting count. On 0 <#ff0046>the spell will be activated</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_03_06
datalist.message: Chronos! Before battle begins, activate the <#ff0046>Regalia</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_01
datalist.message: A Regalia is a <#ff0046>once-per-battle only special power</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_02
datalist.message: Regalia can be activated when the <#ff0046>Regalia Gauge</color> is filled.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_03
datalist.message: It's time! <#ff0046>Touch</color> to <#ff0046>activate</color> it!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_04
datalist.message: This Regalia will <#ff0046>stop enemy movement</color> for three counts!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_05
datalist.message:
We did it!
We made it to the castle!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_06
datalist.message: Damage the opponent!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_07
datalist.message: If you attack the opponent, the used weapon will be destroyed and the ally retreats.

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_08
datalist.message: Oh! When the remaining count is low, <#ff0046>CLIMAX</color> occurs!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_09
datalist.message: MP and card stock will <#ff0046>increase way faster</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_04_10
datalist.message: That's it for the <#ff0046>basic strategy</color>! Use <#ff0046>weapon cards</color> and <#ff0046>deployments</color> to finish them off!

datalist.name: Tutorial_10_01
datalist.message: Chronos! Before the battle begins, <#ff0046>let's choose</color> the <#ff0046>Regalia</color> that we will use!

datalist.name: Tutorial_10_02
datalist.message: Regalia have <#ff0046>various effects</color>. We, <#ff0046>the fairies of time</color> are here to help you!

datalist.name: Tutorial_10_03
datalist.message: Touch a Regalia to check it's effects!

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_01
datalist.message: Next, let's review the <#ff0046>card types</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_02
datalist.message: With weapon cards, you can '<#ff0046>deploy</color>' characters and <#ff0046>attack</color> your opponent.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_03
datalist.message: It has a <#ff0046>square icon</color>, a <#ff0046>sword</color> and an attack power number.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_04
datalist.message: Tool cards can be '<#ff0046>used</color>' on units that are deployed.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_05
datalist.message: It has a <#ff0046>hexagonal icon</color> and a vial.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_06
datalist.message: Magic cards need to be <#ff0046>casted</color>, <#ff0046>before they can be activated</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_11_07
datalist.message: It has a <#ff0046>round icon</color>, a <#ff0046>spellbook</color> and a number for the casting time.

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_01
datalist.message: A new friend has joined! Let's check them again!

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_02
datalist.message: Each unit has its own <#ff0046>specific features</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_03
datalist.message: Alec is <#ff0046>good</color> at <#ff0046>combat</color> with <#ff0046>weapon cards with high attack power</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_04
datalist.message: Lotta is <#ff0046>good</color> at <#ff0046>healing</color> her allies with <#ff0046>tool cards and magic cards.

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_05
datalist.message: Luka is good at <#ff0046>acting quickly</color> with <#ff0046>low MP cost</color>.

datalist.name: Tutorial_12_06
datalist.message: Take advantage of their individual characteristics!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_01
datalist.message: Some cards have not yet been explained!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_02
datalist.message: I will now explain the <#ff0046>special "SACRED" weapon cards</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_03
datalist.message: I'm afraid you don't have a SACRED weapon... Leave it to me! There you go!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_04
datalist.message: Touch the <#ff0046>SACRED card</color> in Alec's hand!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_05
datalist.message: SACRED cards are <#ff0046>powerful weapon cards</color>, which in addition to MP, also require your unit's <#ff0046>level</color> to be raised!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_06
datalist.message: This number shows the <#ff0046>minimum required level</color>. It must be equal or higher to that number to deploy it.

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_07
datalist.message: It seems that Alec's level is not enough...

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_08
datalist.message: The level rises by <#ff0046>playing cards</color> and <#ff0046>fighting</color>, but... Ey~!!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_09
datalist.message: This time only, I have raised the level!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_10
datalist.message: But it seems like I can't do it on my own. We don't have enough MP...

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_11
datalist.message: Use the power of Chronos to <#ff0046>increase your MP</color> for the missing amount!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_12
datalist.message: You can select an unwanted card and <#ff0046>convert it to MP</color>! Touch <#ff0046>"MP Convert"</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_13
datalist.message: You have enough MP! Now <#ff0046>touch</color> the SACRED weapon and send it out!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_14
datalist.message: The SACRED weapon <#ff0046>grants [Uplift III] to all deployed allies!</color>

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_15
datalist.message: Uplift will increase your allies' <#ff0046>attack after each battle!</color>

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_16
datalist.message: SACRED weapons are powerful cards that can decide the winner! Use them wisely!

datalist.name: Tutorial_13_17
datalist.message: Chronos! Continue to direct your units and fight freely!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_01
datalist.message: Chronos, thank you for your hard work!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_02
datalist.message: Next, try out a COM Battle with your friends!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_11
datalist.message: You have completed the tutorial!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_12
datalist.message: Thanks to completing the tutorial, Misha has joined us! Let me introduce you to her!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_13
datalist.message: But there's also something special waiting for you!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_21
datalist.message: You did it! I will give you a special summoning ticket!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_22
datalist.message:
Collect stamps,
<#ff0046>and get rewards!</color>

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_23
datalist.message: Now, use the summoning ticket <#ff0046>and summon a card!</color>

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_24
datalist.message: You can change the cards in your deck by selecting Edit.

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_25
datalist.message: You can obtain new cards by <#ff0046>playing</color> or <#ff0046>summoining them</color> from the shop.

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_26
datalist.message:
That's all from me.
[T/L Note (Haruka, Yonokid): Have fun!!]

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_27
datalist.message: If you are unfamiliar with the world, play through the <#ff0046>story mode</color>!

datalist.name: Tutorial_Home_28
datalist.message: Let's keep up the good work with our friends in the next battle!
